statements: SELECT * FROM fintech_solutions;
SELECT id, account_number, balance FROM fintech_solutions;
SELECT * FROM fintech_solutions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, balance FROM fintech_solutions WHERE account_number = 123456;
SELECT * FROM fintech_solutions WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT account_number, balance FROM fintech_solutions WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM fintech_solutions ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, account_number, balance FROM fintech_solutions ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT AVG(balance) FROM fintech_solutions;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fintech_solutions WHERE user_id = 200;
SELECT MAX(balance) FROM fintech_solutions;
SELECT MIN(balance) FROM fintech_solutions;
SELECT id, account_number, user_id FROM fintech_solutions WHERE balance BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM fintech_solutions WHERE balance <= 500 AND user_id = 300;
SELECT id, account_number, balance FROM fintech_solutions WHERE user_id = 400 AND account_number = 654321;
SELECT SUM(balance) FROM fintech_solutions;
SELECT * FROM fintech_solutions WHERE account_number IN (123456, 654321);
SELECT id, account_number, balance, user_id FROM fintech_solutions WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, account_number, balance FROM fintech_solutions LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM fintech_solutions WHERE user_id NOT IN (100, 200);
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'jane_smith';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = 'test@example.com';
SELECT id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'test_user' AND email = 'test@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'j%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE password = 'hashed_password';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users;
SELECT AVG(id) FROM users;
SELECT MIN(id) FROM users;
SELECT MAX(id) FROM users;
SELECT DISTINCT email FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'admin' OR username = 'root';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = 'test1@example.com' OR email = 'test2@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1 AND username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1 OR username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users INNER JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id;
SELECT u.username, t.amount FROM users u INNER JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM transactions);
SELECT MAX(amount) FROM transactions;
SELECT user_id, MIN(amount) FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT u.username, SUM(t.amount) FROM users u INNER JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id GROUP BY u.username;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE DATE(transaction_date) = CURDATE();
SELECT user_id, AVG(amount) FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING AVG(amount) > 100;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users;
SELECT username, COUNT(*) FROM transactions GROUP BY username;
SELECT AVG(amount) FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Accounts;
SELECT account_id, account_type, balance FROM Accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings';
SELECT * FROM Transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, amount FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Loans;
SELECT loan_id, customer_id, loan_amount FROM Loans WHERE loan_amount < 5000;
SELECT Customers.first_name, Accounts.balance FROM Customers INNER JOIN Accounts ON Customers.customer_id = Accounts.customer_id;
SELECT first_name, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM Customers INNER JOIN Accounts ON Customers.customer_id = Accounts.customer_id GROUP BY first_name;
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount FROM Loans WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Customers WHERE first_name = 'John');
SELECT account_id, customer_id, balance FROM Accounts WHERE customer_id = (SELECT customer_id FROM Customers WHERE first_name = 'Alice');
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM Transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT loan_id, loan_type, start_date FROM Loans WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_id, AVG(balance) AS average_balance FROM Accounts GROUP BY account_id HAVING AVG(balance) > 5000;
SELECT first_name, MAX(balance) AS max_balance FROM Customers INNER JOIN Accounts ON Customers.customer_id = Accounts.customer_id GROUP BY first_name;
SELECT count(*) AS total_customers FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM Customers LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email, registration_date FROM user_info;
SELECT * FROM user_info WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_info WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_info WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_info;
SELECT AVG(user_id) FROM user_info;
SELECT MAX(user_id) FROM user_info;
SELECT MIN(user_id) FROM user_info;
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM user_info;
SELECT * FROM user_info ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_info WHERE username LIKE '%doe%';
SELECT * FROM user_info WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM user_info WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT username) FROM user_info;
SELECT * FROM user_info WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM user_info WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM user_info WHERE username = 'jane_doe' OR username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_info LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM user_info OFFSET 5;
SELECT * FROM user_info WHERE user_id > 10 AND username != 'admin';
